amendment.description: Amendment provides $2 million for prisoner re-entry programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by $2,000,000 funding for prisoner re-entry programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Wolf.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
